definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: The chain guide frame of coal cutting machine is produced with metabainited cast steel.
